com.sunilos.proj0.dao

Interface UserDAOInt

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserDAOHibImpl

    public interface UserDAOInt
    User DAO Interface provides abstract methods of CRUD operations. Implementation will be done by JDBC, Hibrenate or JPA. All methods propagate unchecked DataAccessException. It is a generic exception handling provided by Spring-DAO. If DataAccessException is propagated from a method then declarative transaction is rolled back by Spring AOP.
    Since:
    1 Jan 2015
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sunil Sahu
